description: Light cushion meets heavy durability in our Hike Light Cushion Winding Trail Crew Socks. Made to help keep you comfortable from trailhead to summit, these Merino wool hikinh socks combine our 4 Degree elite fit system with our Virtually Seamless toe and Indestructawool technology for maximum comfort even on the most rugged trails. And an 8" crew height pairs perfectly with your favorite hiking boots. Gear up to go far.
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Winding Trail Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 56% Merino Wool, 12% Nylon, 30% Recycled Nylon, 2% Elastane
